channel.title: AllstarScape vs DeltaScape vs Project Insantiy...give your Opinion!
channel.description:
I'm currently an Allstar/Delta guy, but I'm considering switching my source greatly...Please give your pros and cons on AllstarScape, DeltaScape, and Project Insanity. It would greatly help me choose a new server.
Thanks for your help!
TheCyberMan
P.S. Sorry if this isn't exactly the right place for my post...it's the closest! :)

item.source: AllstarScape vs DeltaScape vs Project Insantiy...give your Opinion!

item.title: AllstarScape vs DeltaScape vs Project Insantiy...give your Opinion!
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Delta can be cleaned, optimized and packaged. Delta has a greater library of tutorials and stuff you can find. If you’re more experienced however, I recommend Hyperion because it is incredibly stable. The only drawback to it is, you have to make just about everything from scratch so unless you really know your Java, stick to delta.

Read full topic
item.source: AllstarScape vs DeltaScape vs Project Insantiy...give your Opinion!

item.title: AllstarScape vs DeltaScape vs Project Insantiy...give your Opinion!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Of the three, delta would be the easiest to code. But, I would prefer to use a PI.

Read full topic
item.source: AllstarScape vs DeltaScape vs Project Insantiy...give your Opinion!

item.title: AllstarScape vs DeltaScape vs Project Insantiy...give your Opinion!
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:11, topic:406552”][quote author=str2own99 link=topic=503553.msg3683852#msg3683852 date=1311723328]
all are shit
[/quote]
All are better than what you can do.

neither, hyperion.

So tell me why Hyperion is a better choice? Or are you spewing bull?

@OP: Well, if I had to choose among the three, I would go with Delta, because the code, although messy and inefficient, can be cleaned up if you really are determined to do so. Personally, I haven’t used PI, so I can’t really criticize it. Allstar was probably the first source I experimented with and I would advise straying away from it unless you decide to use a clean source. There were a few released by Kihomura.[/quote]
i did not say it was a better choice thats just my personal preference of server

Read full topic
item.source: AllstarScape vs DeltaScape vs Project Insantiy...give your Opinion!

item.title: AllstarScape vs DeltaScape vs Project Insantiy...give your Opinion!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

str2own99:

all are shit

All are better than what you can do.

gnomez:

neither, hyperion.

So tell me why Hyperion is a better choice? Or are you spewing bull?

@OP: Well, if I had to choose among the three, I would go with Delta, because the code, although messy and inefficient, can be cleaned up if you really are determined to do so. Personally, I haven’t used PI, so I can’t really criticize it. Allstar was probably the first source I experimented with and I would advise straying away from it unless you decide to use a clean source. There were a few released by Kihomura.

Read full topic
